item.description:
Let's meet at Cambridge Common, located near Harvard Square on Mass Ave. For a map of the park, visit Google Maps and type in "Cambridge Common."

We'll meet at 5:00 and throw the ball around while getting to know each others' names. If we have enough people, we'll get a game going! Check our About Us page for a list of game rules. If people are flexible with their time we can get some ice cream or grab drinks afterwards.

Parking in metered locations is free on Sunday. For those who take public transportation, the Harvard T stop and the 66 bus stop are a couple blocks away. Send me a note if you have any questions!
item.name: Flag Football on Cambridge Common
